content:
You are surveyed about video game prefferences. Reply to the statement below with one of the five options: I LIKE IT, I EXPECT IT, I AM NEUTRAL, I CAN TOLERATE IT, I DISLIKE IT. Your answer should only contain the chosen option. 
What would you say if there were options to design your own avatar?
